column1: 50|232|430|Stand behind the box that is on the attackers side of Showers
column2: aim so that the bottom of your crosshair is touching the top of the right palm tree and release with one bar. This will Land on the wall above u-haul and will have vision into pocket

column1: 52|521|477|Stand behind the box that is on the attackers side of Showers
column2: aim so that your crosshair is on this little gap in the middle tree and release with 2 bars.  This will land on the left wall in B
column5: and the corner on the right of the site.  https://youtu.be/fhiBv0sdtPQ

column1: 54|483|500|Stand on the stone that is to the right of the fountain
column2: aim so that the center of the bounce indicators is on the bottom of this shutter support
column3: and release with 2 bars.  This will land on the wall at the back of the site.  https://youtu.be/P8UeL8ZTHW4

column1: 56|479|328|Stand on the double cactus that is at the back of B Lobby
column2: place the center between the bounce indicator on the little dot and release with 1 bar. This will land in the window on the top of Hookah.  https://youtu.be/3wiffJdHeRw

column1: 58|535|442|Stand in the corner that is towards the attacker side of B long
column2: place the center between the bounce indicators on the top left portion of this decoration and release with 1 bar.  It will land on the wall above Elbow

column1: 60|140|425|Stand at the corner on the right side of link
column2: place the bottom right corner of the power indicator on the 3rd rebar
column3: then aim up until the top of the bounces text is in line with corner of the building
column4: release with 2 bars.  This will land on the slanted air conditioning unit
column5: giving vision of the back of truck and heaven.  https://youtu.be/3Rb1duDbopU
